verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help;<s%> and <S%H8172>stay<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H7227>many;<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are very <S%H6105>strong;<s%> <S%H3966><s%> but they <S%H8159>look<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD!<s%>

Yet <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> call <S%H5493>back<s%> his <S%H1697>words:<s%> but will <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5833>help<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

Now the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> and their <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> both he that <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> and he that is <S%H5826>helped<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down,<s%> and they <S%H3605>all<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Like <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>roaring<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H2964>prey,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> is called <S%H7121>forth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, he will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2865>afraid<s%> of their <S%H4480>voice,<s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6031>abase<s%> himself for the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H1995><s%> of them: <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>fight<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1389>hill<s%> thereof.

As <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H5774>flying,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H1598>defending<s%> also he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> it; and passing <S%H6452>over<s%> he will <S%H4422>preserve<s%> it.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye unto him from <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>revolted.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> shall cast <S%H3988>away<s%> his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your own <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> unto you for a <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> of a mighty <S%H376>man;<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> of a mean <S%H120>man,<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> him: but he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and his young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4522>discomfited.<s%>

And he shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to his <S%H5553>stronghold<s%> for <S%H4480>fear,<s%> <S%H4032><s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall be <S%H2865>afraid<s%> of the <S%H4480>ensign,<s%> <S%H5251><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H217>fire<s%> is in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and his <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
